cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Destroy this card and Deal 20 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is sent to the Grave: you can Shuffle any number of 'Compound' cards from your Grave into your Deck then Deal 10 damage to a Champion for each card returned.

[ACTIVATED] Return this card to the Hand and Destroy 1 Equipment equipped to this Champion then Deal 40 damage to a Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed by the effect of 'Bloodrite': Return it to the Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy all Equipment attached to this Champion then Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: you can Add any number of 'Droplet's from Deck to Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 Equipment you control then Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle 4 ‘Fireball’s from your Grave into your Deck then Deal 40 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Send 1 ‘Spirit of Eurydice’ from your Deck to your Grave then Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
